title: KPIT | Software Engineer(Python) | Offer | 2.2 YOE
content:
Education: BE in IT(Tier-3)
Years of Experience: 2.2 Years
Prior Experience: Software Engineer at Service Based Company
Prior Compensation: 625,000
Date of the Offer: September-2024
Company: KPIT Technologies
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Pune
Salary: 11,50,000
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Bonus: None
Relocation bonus they will give but amount not mentioned.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 11,50,000
Benefits: Standard insurance benefits.

title: Nielsen | MTS 1 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BE (non circuit) from Tier 1
Years of Experience: 1
Prior Experience: Large Indian Company

Date of the Offer: Jun 2024
Company: Nielsen
Title/Level: MTS 1 / Software Engineer
Location: BLR
Salary: Rs. 18L
ESOP: 0
Joining Bonus: 0
Total comp: Rs 18L
Other details: decent hike at base but they weren't providing any bonus at my level which was kind of a disappointment

title: Cloudera Bangalore IC1
content:
Education: BTech, Tier-3
Years of Experience: ~1
Prior Experience: SDE at early stage startup
Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: Cloudera
Title/Level: SDE 1 (IC1)
Location: Bengaluru/ Remote
Salary: 17L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 9000$ for 4 years
Bonus: 85k
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~20L
Benefits: Standard benefits that you can find on their website
Is this a standard offer from Cloudera considering my experience? The recruiter told me in the screening call itself that the max they can offer for IC1 role is this and we could connect in the future if I wasn't happy with this compensation.

Also, how is the Cloudera tag right now? Is it relevant enough? I believe working at Cloudera's data platform could help me get calls from FAANG companies for their cloud platform roles. What do you guys think?
